column2: However, you will go no farther than two miles from the barracks, you will behave in a manner that befits a Royal Fusilier and you will report back to the guardroom sober as a judge at one minute before nine.

Normally an assistant would have put [the television] on for him at one minute to nine. He sat watching a Nigerian woman give a talk on dressmaking, followed by the weather forecast man who supplied Eduardo with the revealing information that the temperature would continue to be hot for the next month.
Well, what an amazing culinary experience, Eva said at 8:59 p.m., when Pragerâ€™s car parked in front of her apartment.
